name: Captivity
description: You wake up to the smell of rotting flesh in what can only be described as someone's basement. Your memory is blank and your vision impaired, you have no idea where you are. The floors and walls are dirty, it appears there may be other people here as there are dirty sheets on the floor.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP(SP3)/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: AMD Phenom 9550 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Radeon 4800 or gtx 560 Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: XP(SP3)/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: intel core i5 or better @3GHZ Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: Radeon 6800 or gtx 960 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 9 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
